title: What configurations does the Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Yoga Gen 7 come in?
content:
Lenovo recently launched its top-tier business laptops for 2022, including the ThinkPad X1 Yoga Gen 7 convertible. If you’re in the market for a business laptop, you can’t do much better than a ThinkPad, and the X1 Yoga is a fantastic convertible option. The latest iteration comes with upgraded Intel processors, a new display option,

description: If you're looking to buy the Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Yoga Gen 7, it's important to choose the right configuration for you. Here are your options.
